title: GOV.UK transforms its search function with help from Google Cloud
summary: GOV.UK, the UK government's website, upgraded its search functionality using Google Cloud's technology.  This improved search aims to make government information more easily accessible to the public.  The upgrade leverages Google Cloud's scalable and reliable infrastructure for faster and more relevant search results.

title: How Honeywell is using Google AI to prepare for the industrial future
summary: Honeywell is leveraging Google Cloud's AI to enhance its industrial operations and predict equipment failures.  This collaboration uses machine learning to improve efficiency and safety across Honeywell's diverse industrial assets.  The partnership aims to drive innovation and prepare for future advancements in industrial technology.
